snippet: A group calling itself Free Swabylon defaced a statue with the southern German noodle dish, the latest episode in an escalating quarrel between Berliners and migrants from Swabia.
abstract: Berlin Journal; group calling itself Free Swabylon defaces statue in Berlin with spatzle, southern German noodle dish, latest episode in escalating quarrel between Berliners and migrants from southern district of Swabia; vandals are calling for autonomous Swabian district in Berlin.

byline.contributor: Victor Homola and Chris Cottrell contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A group calling itself Free Swabylon defaced a statue with the southern German noodle dish, the latest episode in an escalating quarrel between Berliners and migrants from Swabia.

headline.seo: Swabian Separatists Fling Spätzle to Make a Point
headline.main: Swabian Separatists Fling Spätzle to Make Their Point
headline.print_headline: Swabian Separatists Fling Spätzle to Make Their Point
